name: My Top 10 Trips of 2022
description:
Get Surfshark VPN at https://surfshark.deals/winginit - Enter promo code WINGINIT to get 83% off + THREE EXTRA MONTHS for free!

Thanks for joining me as I give you a rundown of my top ten trips of 2022! It was a great year to get back into my stride, travelling by plane, rail, and even...a couple of buses! Let me know if there's a trip YOU liked which I haven't included! Also, there's a little mistake in the video near the end...keep watching and comment when you see it! :-D
